metadata.title: Torn City Items Database
metadata.description: Complete database of all Torn City items with categorization

consumables.name: Xanax
consumables.description: Xanax in Torn City is very different to your typical pharmacy-bought Alprazolam, with its sedative effects giving way to an explosion of relentless energy. Researchers speculate that this phenomenon is rooted in the drug's ability to boost adenosine triphosphate production within neural cells, supercharging the brain into an overclocked state capable of firing neurons like a machine-gun. However it works, Torn Xanax is the grease that oils the gears of war, elevating a soldier to a state of aggressive frenzy that would make a Nazi Stormtrooper look like a slowpoke sissy.
consumables.effect: Increases energy by 250 and happiness by 75. Includes side effects.
